context: I am okay. Feeling pretty tired after a long day. Action movies always keep me entertained and upbeat. Know any good ones?
I know a few off top my head. Die Hard (1988) is a great action movie That and Looper (2012) are good Bruce Willis Flicks.
I have heard so much about the Die hard franchise but I've never seen all of them I've seen Looper, it was alright.
resp: If you are in the mood for a good story Pan's Labyrinth (2006) is a real kicker.
